Introduction
This topic contains information on handling a Veteranâ€™s failure to report for a scheduled examination, including
effect of non-cooperation on the duty to provide an examination or opinion
definition of good cause
review of returned mail notifying the Veteran of a scheduled examination
action taken after attempting to locate a better address
allegations of non-receipt of scheduling notice
, and
initial scheduling problems and rescheduling examinations
.
title: M21-1, Part IV, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section F - Failure to Report and Rescheduling Examinations
citation: Part IV, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section F
